documentType: FBI Collected Item Log / Evidence Receipt
summary: This is an FBI evidence log documenting the seizure of a Dell Powerridge DVR controller and a DVR system (NICE VISION PRO) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) in New York on August 15, 2019. The seizure is part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the subject (UNSUB) of the death investigation for which the DVR equipment was seized from the Metropolitan Corrections Center.

events.title: Seizure of DVR Equipment from MCC
events.description: An FBI Special Agent seized a Dell Powerridge 8420 DVR Controller and a DVR System #1 (NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, New York
keyFacts: FBI agents seized DVR recording equipment from the Metropolitan Corrections Center on August 15, 2019, as part of the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation.
The seized equipment included a Dell Powerridge 8420 DVR Controller and a NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder system with 16 hard drives.
The document is an official FBI evidence log, indicating the seizure was part of a formal investigative process.
The case is identified as 90A-NY-3151227, categorized as a death investigation with Epstein as the subject.
